title: River Shen
body: What do you mean by this, and when is it being added to dynamic queue so that I can first time it in ranked?

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=udBa7LCcNGQ

SHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

N-nothing to see here folks!
Yes... let the memes flow through you...
Memes? No, weak one. We are far above such small titles.

I used to RiverEve.
Then Rito took my Elixir of Ruin away and I couldn't ridiculously push anymore.
I had no idea.  Thanks.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

If you actually want to play river shen in dynamic queue, queue up as support and then just play as river shen. Traditionally, river shen takes the place of a support, so the lanes end up 1 top, 1 mid, 1 bot, 1 jungle, and river shen. If you tried to go river shen after getting something other than support, it puts your team at a disadvantage compared to getting support and going river shen.
I go Top and do River Shen, I let them think they are alone top, push to my turret and right when they hit it i run out and taunt them into it and kill them. Works 60% of the time 100% of the time.
Cry me a River Shen {{item:3070}}
here's to a little while from now when river shen dies forever.

Actually, if you can tag them with the sword, the slow when moving away from Shen seems pretty damn strong.

You could start Q, drag the sword into the river bush, then walk into the lane bushes. When they come into lane, call the sword through them and destroy them. 

A bit harder than now, but with more potential CC at level 1
yeah, but now you can't sustain off Scuttle anymore with new Q

That is true.

Well, Rivershen got by when Scuttle didn't exist, so he can probably continue to Rivershen without it.

That is true.

Well, Rivershen got by when Scuttle didn't exist, so he can probably continue to Rivershen without it.
